Police praise Waihī Beach school group’s actions after becoming lost in Whakamārama bush https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/police-praise-waihi-beach-school-groups-actions-after-becoming-lost-in-whakamarama-bush/O62ZWD7QURGVLM4YRHTXNUAO5Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/police-praise-waihi-beach-school-groups-actions-after-becoming-lost-in-whakamarama-bush/O62ZWD7QURGVLM4YRHTXNUAO5Q/ Sandra ConchieThe search for the missing students ended in success. Sun, 19 Nov 2023 04:01:10 +0000 Te Puna Quarry Park, where a school group from Waihī Beach Primary School got lost last week but "did all the right things", police said.
Fireworks shot at police as 200 vehicles stopped at Hawke’s Bay street racing event https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/fireworks-shot-at-police-as-two-hundred-vehicles-stopped-at-hawkes-bay-street-race-event/ X762ZRH6XZFGVFORXHWJW6Z7QA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/fireworks-shot-at-police-as-two-hundred-vehicles-stopped-at-hawkes-bay-street-race-event/ X762ZRH6XZFGVFORXHWJW6Z7QA/ Dozens of infringements were handed out, nine cars impounded, and some arrested. Mountain mystery: Can the central Southern Alps trigger 7.0-magnitude earthquakes? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mountain-mystery-can-the-central-southern-alps-trigger-70-magnitude-earthquakes/ME37CF6G​​6NESNPWELW6FJBPNHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mountain-mystery-can-the-central-southern-alps-trigger-70-magnitude-earthquakes/ME37CF6G​​6NESNPWELW6FJBPNHM/ Jamie MortonScientists will trek to Aoraki/Mt Cook to uncover the area's earthquake history. Sun, 19 Nov 2023 03:52:31 +0000 Aoraki/Mt Cook. Scientists are trekking into the central Southern Alps to unlock the secrets of what remains one of the least understood fault systems in the country. Photo / Air Safaris
